item.title: Chinese Fonts on a Linux System
item.description: If your computer can’t render the title of this post, you need to install the correct Chinese. The process is preety straight-forward except for some small things. Fonts Chinese fonts are quite unique and in Linux, you need to install some specific fonts to make the rendering more clear. The following fonts will make Chinese Chracters rendering better on your linux machine. Adobe Source Sans Sans The Source Han Sans is a set of OpenType/CFF Pan-CJK fonts.
